LanguageData.TO_ResetAllSettingsHover: Reset all Trading Options to their default values.
LanguageData.TO_ResetCurrentSettingsHover: Reset Trading Options of the current trader category to their default values.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send {0} caravans per year.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanAmountDefault: By default, non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send 4 caravans per year.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanTime: They will also wait {0} days before sending another caravan.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanTimeDefault: By default, they will wait 6 days before sending another caravan.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanChance: Random storytellers such as Randy will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same random chance increase is used for both caravans and visitors.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanChanceDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy will use the default random chance of sending a caravan or visitor.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send {0} orbital traders per period.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalAmountDefault: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send the default amount of orbital traders per period.

LanguageData.TO_OrbitalTimeDefault: By default, the period for sending orbital traders is of 15 days.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalChance: Random storytellers such as Randy will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending an orbital trader.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalChanceDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy will use the default random chance of sending an orbital trader.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send {0} visitors per year.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorAmountDefault: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra will send the default amount of visitors per year.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorTime: They will also wait {0} days before sending another visitor.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorTimeDefault: By default, they will wait 5 days before sending another caravan.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorChance: Random storytellers such as Randy will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same random chance increase is used for both caravans and visitors.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorChanceDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy will use the default random chance of sending a caravan or visitor.
LanguageData.TO_FrequencyUnchanged: Change default arrival frequency values by adjusting the sliders.
LanguageData.TO_FrequencyChanged: Set the sliders to the minimum to let storytellers use their default value.
LanguageData.TO_RestockFrequencyDefault: By default, settlements will restock every 30 days.
LanguageData.TO_RestockFrequency: Settlements will restock every {0} days. Set the slider to the minimum to use the default value.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanDeparture: Caravans will stay at the colony for {0}.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanDepartureDefault: Caravans will stay at the colony for a time between 11 hours and 18 hours.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalDeparture: Orbital traders will stay in range for {0}.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalDepartureDefault: By default, orbital traders will stay in range for 16 hours.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorDeparture: Visitors will stay at the colony for {0}.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorDepartureDefault: Visitors will stay at the colony for a time between 3 hours and 9 hours.
LanguageData.TO_StockSilver: start with {0}% of their normal silver stock.
LanguageData.TO_StockSilverDefault: start with their normal silver stock.
LanguageData.TO_StockStock: They start with {0}% of their stock in other wares.
LanguageData.TO_StockStockDefault: They start with their normal stock in other wares.
LanguageData.TO_StockWealth: These starting stock amounts are increased depending on colony wealth, with diminishing results.
LanguageData.TO_StockWealthDefault: These starting amounts values are not adjusted for wealthy colonies.
LanguageData.TO_StockUnchanged: Set the sliders to the minimum to use default values.
LanguageData.TO_StockChanged: Adjust the sliders to modify trader stock amounts.
LanguageData.TO_InfoDescription: Type a colony wealth level to calculate the silver and stock adjustments of traders with the current settings.
LanguageData.TO_SlaverCommonality: Slaver traders will appear regardless of colony population.
LanguageData.TO_ExcludeAnimals: Exclude animals from stock increases. This may help with performance issues when traders are present.
